text: Vladimir Vukicevic (born 6 May 1991) is a Norwegian hurdler. He won a silver medal in the 110 metres hurdles at the 2010 World Junior Championships. He is coached by his father, Petar Vukićević, a former Olympic hurdler. Vladimir's sister, Christina Vukicevic, also competed in the sprint hurdles. His personal bests are 13.54 seconds in the 110 metres hurdles (-1.8 m/s, Amsterdam 2016) and 7.69 seconds in the 60 metres hurdles (Gothenburg 2013).
